hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOWO.EOWO_ID, EOWO.CREATOR, EOWO.CREATE_TIME, EOWO.MODIFIER, EOWO.MODIFY_TIME, EOWO.REC_VER, EOWO.REC_STATUS, EOWO.ORG_ID, EOWO.PM_CODE, EOWO.EOWO_WORK_ORDER_NO, EOWO.EOWO_ORDER_NO, EOWO.EOWO_EDI_FLAG, EOWO.EOWO_UPSTREAM_SYS, EOWO.EOWO_ORDER_CLOSED_FLAG, EOWO.EOWO_TASK_BIG_TYPE, EOWO.EOWO_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, EOWO.EOWO_UPSTREAM_CONFIRM_FLAG FROM EO_WORK_ORDER_EDI EOWO WHERE 1=1
